sub_title: Digital Marketing and Social Media Specialist
summary:
Blog Content | SEO Outreach | Social Media Marketing | Digital Marketing | Brand Communications | Growth Hacking| Brand Awareness | Engineering | Chemistry | Environment | Occupational Safety | HSE | Programming

Extensive knowledge of Content and Digital Marketing, with over 4+ years of experience as a Content Creator for Profissão Turista (https://www.profissaoturista.com.br). Developing and executing Communications, Social Media Growth, and Marketing Strategy. Focus on providing useful travel tips, inspiration, and advice to loyal readers across the world.

Skilled in SEO, Google Analytics, CMS tools, Online Content Production, Communication Strategies, Social Media, Writing, and Editing. Working on a wide range of online communication, media strategy including websites and social media. Recognized for developing and providing meaningful stories, transmitting knowledge to different audiences, and generating awareness and engagement.

Digital Content Expert, with an MBA in Business Management (Universidade do Estado do Rio de Janeiro), Specialization in Occupational Safety Engineering (Universidade Católica de Petrópolis), Bachelor of Chemical Engineering (Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro), and Information Technology (Instituto Nícia Macieira). Previous experience working with Environmental Projects, Workplace Safety, Programming, Sustainability, HSE, Facilities, and EHS Management.

Seeking to develop new partner relationships, aiming to gain experience in Media & Content strategies, SEO, Programmatic Marketing, Search Optimization tools, Project Management, Branding, and Social Media Advertising. Fluent in Portuguese. Advanced in English.

Hands-On Experience, focusing on the desired project result. Easy working on teams, International Experience, Clear Precise Communicator, Comprehensive, Detail Oriented, and Leadership Skills. Ability to negotiate with clients and partners.

Goals: Set, plan, and implement social media and communication strategies.

Relevant Keywords:

► SEO, Social Media Marketing, Google Analytics

► Content Creator

► Digital Marketing

► Environmental Management Systems

► Grow Strategy

EU Visa | Right to live and work

profile_positions.description:
- Focus on offering helpful travel tips, inspiration, and advice to loyal readers around the world.

- Creating unique digital content to help brands and destinations leverage search engines, social media, and more in their favor.

- WordPress skills, digital content creation, SEO, social media marketing, Google Analytics, Search Console, drone piloting, photography, videography, and photo editing skills to make sure the brand is represented.

- Managing creative content creation, writing, digital marketing campaigns, quality photography, and more.

- Trusted resource for travel tips, couples travel, luxury travel, destination guides, and best locations to go in Amsterdam and abroad.

- Creating conferences, meeting industry leaders, and working hard to promote professional travel blogging to Brazilians.

Follow me on Instagram: www.instagram.com/profissaoturista

• Facebook: more than 7K followers
